SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.graphics.face

Class ColoredFace

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.graphics.face.ColoredFace
All Implemented Interfaces:
Face, Copyable<Face>
public class ColoredFace extends Object implements Face
A face with a single color component.

  • Constructor Details

    • ColoredFace

      public ColoredFace(@Nonnull Vector3 a, @Nonnull Vector3 b, @Nonnull Vector3 c, @Nonnull Color color)
      Creates a new colored face. The reflectiveness and translucency is derived from the color component.
      Parameters:
      a - The first point of this face
      b - The second point of this face
      c - The third point of this face
      color - The initial color of this face

    • ColoredFace

      public ColoredFace(@Nonnull Vector3 a, @Nonnull Vector3 b, @Nonnull Vector3 c, @Nonnull Color color, double reflectiveness, boolean translucent)
      Creates a new colored face.
      Parameters:
      a - The first point of this face
      b - The second point of this face
      c - The third point of this face
      color - The initial color of this face
      reflectiveness - The reflectiveness factor of this face
      translucent - Whether this face is translucent

    • ColoredFace

      public ColoredFace(@Nonnull Tuple<Vector3> points, @Nonnull Color color, double reflectiveness, boolean translucent)
      Creates a new colored face.
      Parameters:
      points - A tuple containing the points of this face
      color - The initial color of this face
      reflectiveness - The reflectiveness factor of this face
      translucent - Whether this face is translucent
